ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if they still drop there, but I got my Tattered Mantle from Karnor s.  We were near the moat and pulling from somewhere (that was the only time
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if they still drop there, but I got my Tattered Mantle from
Karnor's. We were near the moat and pulling from somewhere (that was the
only time I've hunted there). It came off of either the hand, or one of the
ghosts.
Aye, Guller is 50+, but has a HUGE amount of hps (even for his level). A
montho or so ago, some guildies were hunting bees when they were attacked by
one, then two, then THREE Gullers (have I mentioned that they can summon ye
back to their undead arses?) at the same time. So if ye go a-huntin em,
take plenty of tank and healing power (unless ye have a nice necro friend
;o)~ )

-=B=-
41.4
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 02, 2000 9:09 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!


>
> crescendo is actually less haste than celerity by a little. if your tanks
> already have a haste item, use crescendo because their haste will max
> anyway, and AC+STR is better than +AGI.
>
> for a mantle, if you like ac (and hit points are nice too) go to burning
> woods and grab a tattered mantle. gullerback is 50+ so you may not be
able
> to kill him, but the people in the zone may let you loot one, or like you
> said the guild can go kill him. he used to be extremely common when
kunark
> came out, dunno if they changed that, but he drops the mantle everytime.
if
> buying they are cheap anyway, i think 200-ish. it is ac12 20hp 10disease.
>
> for a cloak, you can't get up to an HBC or cloak of shadows with that
amount
> yet, but a simple upgrade to your cloak is either white-wolf hide,
> lizardscale, or even a cloak of the icebear, which is the highest ac and
> cheapest of the 3.
>
> for belt, i don't think you will find higher ac, or at least can't think
of
> one.
>
> Shada
>
> > Which means I will learn Max's Beserker Cresendo soon. When
> > i am the haster
> > (IE no enchanter in group) I use Celerity now (which i LOVE,
> > the agi buff
> > gives a nice ac boost). Do the experienced (I aask since its
> > high level
> > song) bards think Besrker is better? (it gives str boost I
> > think the haste
> > effect is the same)
> > (This is excluding the obvious benefit of guildmates saying "Olaf, do
> > Beserker.")
> >
> > Loot: I need to upgrade my belt, back and shoulders. What do you all
> > reccomend out there? I like maxing my AC, Resists, CHA, and
> > STR (in that
> > order). Right now I have a Kunzar Mantle (idiot me looted it
> > not knowing it
> > was no drop) (ac7, wis,dex,agi +3), a splinted bronze cloak
> > (UGH!) and a
> > straw spun belt (ac 10, but weighs 6...). I have about 2k
> > right now and
> > dont really have trouble making money, though I would rather
> > go get a guild
> > run to get new items... Any suggestions?
> >
> > Elfson Allegro
> > Bard of Norrath since December. Well not including March and April.
> >
> >
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> > lol@... with the subject submissions.
